Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp12.server.game

Class VirtualView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.psp12.utils.Observable<Message>
it.polimi.ingsw.psp12.server.game.VirtualView
All Implemented Interfaces:
CommandHandler, Observer<Message>
public class VirtualView
extends Observable<Message>
implements Observer<Message>, CommandHandler
Class that manages a client hiding the network interface to the controller of the game
Author:
Luca Morandini
